Detailed Description

A polygon consisting of straight edges along the earth's surface.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

00033                                      {
00034         if (vertices.length < 3){
00035             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Need atleast 3 vertices for polygon.");
00036         }
00037         for (int i=0; i < vertices.length-1; ++i){
00038             Line line = new Line( vertices[i].getLat(), vertices[i].getLon(),
00039                     vertices[i+1].getLat(), vertices[i+1].getLon() );
00040             edges.add(line);
00041         }
00042         
00043         // connect start and end point
00044         LatLon last = vertices[vertices.length-1];
00045         LatLon first = vertices[0];
00046         edges.add(new Line(last.getLat(),last.getLon(),first.getLat(),first.getLon()));
00047         computeAreaAndCentroid();
00048         boundingBox = new BoundingBox(vertices);
00049     }

boolean edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Polygon.contains ( double  x,
double  y 
)

Workhorse method: finds out if this point is within this polygon. 

00099                                                 {
00100         // as an optimization, check the bounding box first
00101         if (!boundingBox.contains(x,y)){
00102             return false;
00103         }
00104         
00105         int num_xcrossing = 0;
00106         int num_ycrossing = 0;
00107         for (int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00108             Double x_intercept = edges.get(i).getXIntercept(y);
00109             Double y_intercept = edges.get(i).getYIntercept(x);
00110             if (y_intercept != null) {
00111                 if (y_intercept >= y) {
00112                     ++num_ycrossing;
00113                 }
00114             }
00115             if (x_intercept != null) {
00116                 if (x_intercept >= x) {
00117                     ++num_xcrossing;
00118                 }
00119             }
00120         }
00121         // odd number of crossings means inside
00122         return ((num_xcrossing % 2 == 1) && (num_ycrossing % 2 == 1));
00123     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Polygon.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00126                                                             {
00127         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("rasterpolygon");
00128         
00129         // made up
00130         LatLonGrid grid = new LatLonGrid(500, 500, 0, new LatLon(20, -10), 0.01, 0.01);
00131         LatLon[] vertices = new LatLon[]{
00132                 new LatLon(19,-7),
00133                 new LatLon(17.5,-6),
00134                 new LatLon(16.5,-6.8),
00135                 new LatLon(17.2,-8.5),
00136                 new LatLon(16,-9.5),
00137                 new LatLon(17,-9)
00138         };
00139         Polygon poly = new Polygon(vertices);
00140 
00141         // draw edges
00142         final int EDGE = 10;
00143         for (Line line : poly.getEdges()){
00144             for (Pixel p : line.getPositionIn(grid)){
00145                 grid.setValue(p.getRow(), p.getCol(), EDGE);
00146             }
00147         }
00148         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "edges", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00149 
00150         
00151         // fill points inside
00152         final int POLY = 5;
00153         int npix = 0;
00154         for (int i=0; i < grid.getNumLat(); ++i){
00155             for (int j=0; j < grid.getNumLon(); ++j){
00156                 LatLon loc = grid.getLocation(i, j);
00157                 if ( poly.contains(loc.getLat(), loc.getLon())){
00158                     grid.setValue(i,j, POLY);
00159                     ++npix;
00160                 }
00161             }
00162         }
00163         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "polygon", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00164     
00165         System.out.println("Area of polygon: " + poly.getArea() + " num-pixels colored=" + npix);
00166         System.out.println("Centroid of polygon: " + poly.getCentroid());
00167     }
